game.text: DR KAWASHIMA'S BRAIN TRAINING: HOW OLD IS YOUR BRAIN?

Bored of games that don't stretch your brain cells? Then give your grey matter the ultimate workout! Dr Kawashima's Brain Training is a series of exercises designed to train both your mental awareness and your memory via a series of arithmetic, reading and memory tests; through which you can discover the answer to the question: "How old is your brain?"
